abstract: The host Adam Driver also played his “Star Wars” character, Kylo Ren, in another sendup of “Undercover Boss.”
lead_paragraph: It’s been almost 22 years since “Saturday Night Live” last found itself satirizing a presidential impeachment proceeding, but as the show turned its attention to President Trump’s trial in the Senate, it quickly reverted to its tried-and-true formula: a smidgen of factual detail, a dollop of celebrity cameos and a whole bunch of cultural references that may or may not be germane to the topic.
